jd: Job Description: Java/J2EE Application DeveloperLocation: Albany, NY – OnsiteDuration: 6+ MonthsVisa: GC / USC / GC EAD / H4 EADMode of Interview (MOI): SkypeDocumentation Requirement: Passport CopyRequired Qualifications:84 months of experience with J2EE technologies including:EJB (Enterprise Java Beans)JDBC (Java Database Connectivity)JSP (Java Server Pages)XML (eXtensible Markup Language)84 months of experience with Java programming in an IBM development environment using:IBM’s Rational Application Developer (RAD) IDEApplications deployed to WebSphere Application Server (WAS)84 months of experience working with IBM DB2 databases and XML schemas, including:Schema definition, querying, and automated generation60 months of experience in performance tuning applications interacting with databases.60 months of experience working with IBM MQSeries for message queuing.60 months of experience in technical design, development, maintenance, and end-user support of complex systems within large organizations.Required Documentation:RésuméCopy of Candidate Identification (Driver’s License, Green Card, Visa, Passport, etc.)Professional Certifications or Degrees referenced in the qualifications (if applicable).Notes to Agency:The number of qualifications submitted will affect the assigned points.Months are the only acceptable unit of measurement for experience.No minimum number of qualifications is required.This is a highly specialized role for a Java/J2EE Application Developer with extensive experience in IBM environments, WebSphere, DB2, and performance tuning. The position requires onsite presence in Albany, NY, and candidates must submit the required identification documents and résumé for consideration.
